com.upsight.android.internal.util

Class PreferencesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.internal.util.PreferencesHelper

  • public final class PreferencesHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper to access a SharedPreferences owned by Upsight.
